name: ALL ASIA AVIATION ACADEMY
about: All Asia Aviation Academy, the largest pilot school in the Philippines, operates under Japanese management standards and is backed by the KTC Group, a major international business conglomerate. This partnership enables the academy to invest in top-notch equipment, human resources, and facilities, ensuring the best in pilot training. We prioritize our students' comfort, treating them like family and striving to make them feel at home while they train. Our mission is to provide comprehensive and professional pilot training, contributing to the future of aviation. We utilize advanced assessment tools, such as Symbiotics' ADAPT program, to ensure our cadets are well-prepared for high-stress, high-consequence roles in the aviation industry. At All Asia Aviation Academy, we are committed to nurturing talented and capable pilots for the global airline market.
services:
["CPL
INSTRUMENT RATING
